layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 200x200
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 200x200
    LayoutSVGResourceFilter {filter} [id="displacement"] [filterUnits=objectBoundingBox] [primitiveUnits=userSpaceOnUse]
      [feDisplacementMap scale="30.00" xChannelSelector="RED" yChannelSelector="GREEN"]
        [SourceGraphic]
        [feTurbulence type="TURBULENCE" baseFrequency="0.01, 0.01" seed="0.00" numOctaves="5" stitchTiles="0"]
    LayoutSVGEllipse {circle} at (0,0) size 200x200 [fill={[type=SOLID] [color=#000000]}] [cx=100.00] [cy=100.00] [r=100.00]
      [filter="displacement"] LayoutSVGResourceFilter {filter} at (-20,-20) size 240x240
